title: ‘We Must Not be Pushed into a Corner’: Can the Quick-Step Cobbled ‘Wolf Pack’ Bite Back Against Van Aert, Van der Poel?
content:
Former kings of Flanders vow to fight in cobbles crunch with the new 'bigs' of the classics – but do the wolves have the bite?

Read the full article at ‘We Must Not be Pushed into a Corner’: Can the Quick-Step Cobbled ‘Wolf Pack’ Bite Back Against Van Aert, Van der Poel? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
